changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "tb_profile" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "user_id" UUID NOT NULL, "updated_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL, "name" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "phone" VARCHAR(20) NULL, "birthdate" DATE NULL, "language" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "timezone" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "theme" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'SYSTEM', "two_factor_enabled" BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE, "marketing_email" BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE, "push_notification" BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE, "currency_display" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'USD', --- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("user_id") REFERENCES "tb_user"("id") ON DELETE CASCADE );
